alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Hooker; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:16PM CDT until June 06 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT/400 PM MDT/ FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHERRY...NORTHEASTERN HOOKER AND NORTHWESTERN THOMAS COUNTIES... At 415 PM CDT/315 PM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles west of Brownlee, or 16 miles northeast of Mullen, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Seneca, Norway and Giant Hill. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 192 and 202. Highway 83 between mile markers 157 and 167. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
